scripts.dev: NEXT_AUTH_ISSUER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/realms/sample NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=App1 NEXTAUTH_SECRET=secret1 CLIENT_ID=app1 CLIENT_SECRET=foobar1 next dev
scripts.dev2: NEXT_AUTH_ISSUER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/realms/sample2 NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3001 NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=App2 NEXTAUTH_SECRET=secret2 CLIENT_ID=app2 CLIENT_SECRET=foobar2 next dev -p 3001
scripts.start: NEXT_AUTH_ISSUER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/realms/sample NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=App1 NEXTAUTH_SECRET=secret1 CLIENT_ID=app1 CLIENT_SECRET=foobar1 next start
scripts.start2: NEXT_AUTH_ISSUER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/realms/sample2 NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3001 NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=App2 NEXTAUTH_SECRET=secret2 CLIENT_ID=app2 CLIENT_SECRET=foobar2 next start -p 3001
